languages.text: {n}Равор замирает, напряженно глядя вам в глаза и явно пытаясь понять, серьезны ли вы или ехидничаете. Спустя мгновение у Главного кормчего дергается мышца на лице, затем другая, щеки сводит болезненной судорогой, рот чуть перекашивает... и вы понимаете, что уже забывший о такой мимике Равор безуспешно пытается улыбнуться.{/n} "С... спасибо вам, Лорд-капитан. Я вас не подведу".

{n}Ravor freezes, tensely staring you in the eye and clearly trying to discern if your words are meant as mockery. After a moment's pause, a muscle in his face twitches, then another. His cheeks spasm, his mouth twists... and you realise that Ravor is unsuccessfully trying to remember how to smile.{/n} "Th-thank you, Lord Cap'n. I won't let you down."
languages.original_text: {n}Равор замирает, напряженно глядя вам в глаза и явно пытаясь понять, серьезны ли вы или ехидничаете. Я вас не подведу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor freezes, tensely staring you in the eye and clearly trying to discern if your words are meant as mockery. After a moment's pause, a muscle in his face twitches, then another. His cheeks spasm painfully, his mouth twists... and you realise that Ravor is unsuccessfully trying to remember how to smile.{/n} "Th... thank you, Lord Captain. I won't let you down."

His cheeks spasm, his mouth twists... and you realise that Ravor is unsuccessfully trying to remember how to smile.{/n} "Th-thank you, Lord Cap'n. I won't let you down."

languages.text: {n}Ravor erstarrt, sieht dir angespannt in die Augen und versucht ganz klar zu erkennen, ob deine Worte spöttisch gemeint waren. Nach einer kurzen Pause zuckt erst ein Muskel in seinem Gesicht, dann ein anderer. Seine Wangen verkrampfen, sein Mund verzieht sich ... und dir wird klar, dass Ravor sich erfolglos daran zu erinnern versucht, wie man lächelt.{/n} "D... danke, Lord Cap'n. Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor freezes, tensely staring you in the eye and clearly trying to discern if your words are meant as mockery. After a moment's pause, a muscle in his face twitches, then another. His cheeks spasm, his mouth twists... and you realise that Ravor is unsuccessfully trying to remember how to smile.{/n} "Th-thank you, Lord Cap'n. I won't let you down."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor erstarrt, sieht dir angespannt in die Augen und versucht ganz klar zu erkennen, ob deine Worte spöttisch gemeint waren. Nach einer kurzen Pause zuckt erst ein Muskel in seinem Gesicht, dann ein anderer. Seine Wangen verkrampfen, sein Mund verzieht sich ... und dir wird klar, dass Ravor sich erfolglos daran zu erinnern versucht, wie man lächelt.{/n} "D... danke, Lord Cap'n. Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen."

languages.text: {n}Ravor se fige et vous regarde droit dans les yeux d'un air tendu, cherchant visiblement à déterminer si vous vous moquez de lui ou non. Après quelques instants, un muscle se contracte sur son visage, suivi d'un autre. Ses joues sont prises de spasmes, sa bouche se tord... et vous comprenez qu'il tente sans grand succès de se rappeler comment sourire.{/n} « M-Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne vous décevrai pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor freezes, tensely staring you in the eye and clearly trying to discern if your words are meant as mockery. After a moment's pause, a muscle in his face twitches, then another. His cheeks spasm, his mouth twists... and you realise that Ravor is unsuccessfully trying to remember how to smile.{/n} "Th-thank you, Lord Cap'n. I won't let you down."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor se fige et vous regarde droit dans les yeux d'un air tendu, cherchant visiblement à déterminer si vous vous moquez de lui ou non. Après quelques instants, un muscle se contracte sur son visage, suivi d'un autre. Ses joues sont prises de spasmes, sa bouche se tord... et vous comprenez qu'il tente sans grand succès de se rappeler comment sourire.{/n} « M-Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne vous décevrai pas. »

languages.text: {n}雷沃愣在了那里，紧张地盯着你的眼睛，显然想弄清楚你的话是不是在嘲笑他。停顿片刻之后，他脸上的肌肉抽搐了一下，随后又抽搐了一下。他的脸颊痉挛，嘴角扭曲……你意识到，雷沃正在努力回忆如何微笑，但似乎不太成功。{/n}“谢……谢谢你，船长老大，我一定不会让你失望。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor freezes, tensely staring you in the eye and clearly trying to discern if your words are meant as mockery. After a moment's pause, a muscle in his face twitches, then another. His cheeks spasm, his mouth twists... and you realise that Ravor is unsuccessfully trying to remember how to smile.{/n} "Th-thank you, Lord Cap'n. I won't let you down."

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアは硬直し、緊張した様子であなたの目を覗き込み、あなたの言葉がからかいであるか否かを見定めようとしているようだ。しばしの後、彼の表情筋が次々と引きつる。頬は痙攣し、口元が歪み…ラヴォアが笑い方を思い出そうとして失敗しているのだと悟る。{/n}「あ…ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。失望はさせません」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor freezes, tensely staring you in the eye and clearly trying to discern if your words are meant as mockery. After a moment's pause, a muscle in his face twitches, then another. His cheeks spasm, his mouth twists... and you realise that Ravor is unsuccessfully trying to remember how to smile.{/n} "Th-thank you, Lord Cap'n. I won't let you down."

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアは硬直し、緊張した様子であなたの目を覗き込み、あなたの言葉がからかいであるか否かを見定めようとしているようだ。しばしの後、彼の表情筋が次々と引きつる。頬は痙攣し、口元が歪み…ラヴォアが笑い方を思い出そうとして失敗しているのだと悟る。{/n}「あ…ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。失望はさせません」

languages.text: {n}Ravor se queda paralizado, mirándote fijamente a los ojos e intentando averiguar si pretendes burlarte de él con tus palabras. Al rato, un músculo de su cara se contrae, y luego otro. Le da un espasmo en las mejillas, su boca se tuerce, y te das cuenta de que Ravor intenta sin éxito recordar cómo sonreír.{/n} «G... gracias, Capi. No le defraudaré».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor freezes, tensely staring you in the eye and clearly trying to discern if your words are meant as mockery. After a moment's pause, a muscle in his face twitches, then another. His cheeks spasm, his mouth twists... and you realise that Ravor is unsuccessfully trying to remember how to smile.{/n} "Th-thank you, Lord Cap'n. I won't let you down."

languages.text: {n}Ravor donakalıyor ve gergince gözünün içine bakıyor. Söylediklerinle onu tiye alıp almadığı çözmeye çalışıyor belli ki. Bir an bekledikten sonra yüzündeki kaslardan önce biri, sonra bir diğeri seğiriyor. Yanakları kasılıyor, ağzı burkuluyor. İşte o zaman fark ediyorsun ki Ravor aslında nasıl gülümseyeceğini beceriksizce hatırlamaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Te... Teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan. Sizi yüzüstü bırakmayacağım."

His cheeks spasm, his mouth twists... and you realise that Ravor is unsuccessfully trying to remember how to smile.{/n} "Th-thank you, Lord Cap'n. I won't let you down."
